input.sentences: i was so excited today for graduation today .
i finally went to shake hands and receive my diploma .
everyone was very happy to finally graduate .
output.sentences: He was excited to finally be graduating.
He didn't think that he would ever forget receiving his degree with his classmates.
He quickly shook hands with the presenter as they exchanged pleasantries.
Finally his tassle could be moved aside, symbolizing his transition to a graduate.
After everyone has received their degrees they went outside for a group photo.
